txt.en: 'One of you, grab the palantír and bring it to Calenglad, quickly!'
'Amarthiel!'
'I have come to finish this!'
'Did you not? So Angmar's new regent is not all-knowing?'
'Your days are too long already, and they end here!'
'[placeholder]! What are you doing here?'
'Do not let them escape!'
'Kill the one with the seeing-stone!'
'They cannot be allowed to escape!'
'Late, perhaps, but not too late for this!'
'Get them!'
'There is no escape!'
'Quickly, give it here!'
'You cannot harm me, Laerdan. Your weapon is as water to this form.'

'[placeholder], why have you come here? This is not your fight -- I need to confront Amarthiel on my own, as I should have done long ago!

'The time is past, my friend. If I can hold Amarthiel's attention long enough, you will be able to seize the palantír. We will challenge her together, and perhaps she will not realize her peril. When I give you the word, you must seize the palantír and immediately run to the entrance of Barad Tironn -- do not delay! Bring it to Calenglad, and perhaps I will be able to set right my errors of old.

'May the Valar smile upon your endeavour and mine, [placeholder]. Let us go.'
'We have no time to waste, [placeholder]! I weep for Laerdan, but we must retrieve the palantír and remove it from Annúminas!\n\n'Are you ready?'
'Oooh... need rest....'
'Long have I waited to see you again. Long have I waited to destroy you.'
'Need... another rest....'
Amarthiel's terrible power has overcome you!
Amarthiel's terrible power has overcome you!
'Show me... show me...'
You have delivered the palantír to Calenglad
'Show me Narchuil....'
You have failed to escape with the palantír!
'The mists gather... and part...'
'What lies beyond the mists...?'

Laerdan has foolishly listened to the words of Mordrambor and journeyed into Barad Tironn alone to challenge Amarthiel. Calenglad has asked you to steal the palantír from her and aid Laerdan if you can.
'Amarthiel, no!'
'Take the palantír and go!'
'Hurry! Stop for nothing!'
'Bring the palantír from this place! Hurry!'
Follow Laerdan further into Barad Tironn
Enter Barad Tironn and search for the palantír
Survive your encounter with Amarthiel
Someone must take the palantír
Deliver the palantír to Calenglad at the entrance to Barad Tironn
'Mordrambor did his work well. I did not think you would come.'
'Amarthiel! I have come to you at last!'
'Narchuil awaits me within the wilderness.'
'You have come too late.'
'Feel the force of my wrath!'
The palantír is somewhere within Barad Tironn.\n\nYou must find the palantír and steal it before Amarthiel can use it to learn the location of Narchuil.
Amarthiel and the palantír are within Barad Tironn.\n\nLaerdan has confronted Amarthiel, and now you are waiting for his command to seize the palantír and carry it from Barad Tironn.
The palantír is on its pedestal deep within Barad Tironn.\n\nLaerdan has given you the word: one of you must seize the palantír and carry it to Calenglad at the entrance of Barad Tironn! Hurry!
Calenglad is at the entrance to Barad Tironn.\n\nYou must protect the carrier of the palantír and see it delivered to Calenglad at the entrance to Barad Tironn. Hurry!

'The palantír is somewhere within Barad Tironn, [placeholder]. My Men have managed to bring you this far, but we must hold the line -- you will need to find the palantír yourself.\n\n'If you can assist Laerdan in any way once you are inside, I would ask you to do so, but retrieval of the palantír must come first. Once you have seized it, carry it back here to me with as much haste as you can manage -- if Amarthiel realizes what you have done, she will do everything in her power to keep you from escaping with it, so you must be quick!'
'I see trees... the trees of the wilderness....'
Instance: The Eye of Angmar
'The Trollshaws? Narchuil is....'
'When I give the word, one of you must seize the palantír and bring it out of Barad Tironn. But not before I give the word!'
'That is most interesting. Most interesting indeed.'
